definition: shed at an early stage of development, an outbuilding with a single story, cast off hair, skin, horn, or feathers
details:
adjective
- shed at an early stage of development
= synonyms: caducous
noun
- an outbuilding with a single story
verb
- cast off hair, skin, horn, or feathers
= example: cast off hair, skin, horn, or feathers
= synonyms: slough, molt, moult, exuviate
- to get rid of
= example: to get rid of
= synonyms: throw
- cause or allow (a solid substance) to flow or run out or over
= synonyms: spill
- pour out in drops or small quantities or as if in drops or small quantities
= example: pour out in drops or small quantities or as if in drops or small quantities
= synonyms: spill
